dialogues.text: (nods ) Good thinking. You need someone you can trust, worst mistake I ever made was thinking I could do it alone.

dialogues.speaker: PARZIVAL
dialogues.text: I've got someone I trust, Mr. Halliday.

dialogues.speaker: HALLIDAY
dialogues.text: Don’t ever let her go. Halliday disappears. Parzival barely has a moment to regi that he’s gone when he’s violently pulled from the OASIS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade is suddenly pulled out of the Oasis and back into th real world. His rig is surrounded by IOI Security, who al hold Artemis hostage. Nolan Sorrento holds a gun up to Wa

dialogues.speaker: SORRENTO
dialogues.text: Out. Get out of the rig. Wade climbs out, though he LEAVES HIS HEADSET with the microphone facing out.

dialogues.speaker: SORRENTO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The notion that a piece of stack- trash like you would ever run the Oasis is laughable. The entire system would fall apart in days.  118.

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: Maybe. But it’s better than the future you’ve got planned out, you can of monkey balls.

dialogues.speaker: SORRENTO
dialogues.text: Well, I guess we’ll just see about that. Because you’re not walking out of here alive.

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: I think you forget, I’ve already won. I’m a God in the Oasis.

dialogues.speaker: SORRENTO
dialogues.text: You’re not in the Oasis anymore.

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: No, but once I tell everyone that they are released from any debt incurred while in the Oasis and are therefore free to log out right now, well... Sorrento turns to see hundreds of people, rising up out o their rigs.

dialogues.speaker: WADE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I guess the question is, how many bullets do you have in that gun, punk? The crowd of downtrodden “Loyalists” close in on Sorrento

dialogues.speaker: ARTEMIS
dialogues.text: Put the gun down, Sorrento. It’s over. The Guards, seeing they have no chance, let Artemis go.

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: She's right, Nolan. And before you do anything stupider, you might want to hear about the offer I’m prepared to make you, now that I’m in charge. Sorrento is nothing if not pragmatic. He puts the gun dow Wade takes it away from him, and then some of the loyalis grab him.

dialogues.speaker: SORRENTO
dialogues.text: Well, what’s your proposal?  119.

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: Dude, you killed a whole bunch of people including my aunt. You're going to jail, that’s my proposal. Sorrento yells as he is dragged away.

dialogues.speaker: WADE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don’t drop the soap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Sorrento is taken into police custody, Wade and Artemi are joined by Aech, Shoto and Daito. They do a communal t slap hi-five, because as goofy as it looks, that is what’ cool in 2044.

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: First to the key...

dialogues.speaker: ALL
dialogues.text: First to the egg!

dialogues.speaker: BY THE FOUNTAIN
dialogues.text: Wade and Artemis share a quiet moment away from the crowd takes her hand.

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: So what happens now?

dialogues.speaker: ARTEMIS
dialogues.text: I don’t know.

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: Maybe we should buy a really nice apartment and move in together.

dialogues.speaker: ARTEMIS
dialogues.text: Well, we only just met a few days ago.

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: Yeah. But I'm in love with you. Artemis’ lower lip starts to tremble.

dialogues.speaker: ARTEMIS
dialogues.text: You're sure about that?

dialogues.speaker: WADE
dialogues.text: Yes. I am. And I’m not gonna miss my chance to tell you.  120. Artemis leans over and kisses him. We begin to pull back.

dialogues.speaker: WADE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: As we stood there, kissing, it occurred to me that for the first time in as long as I could remember... The kiss is still going...

dialogues.speaker: WADE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: «+. I had absolutely no desire to log back into the OASIS. And as we pull back, back, we hear another voice...

dialogues.speaker: KID, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Did all of that really happen?

dialogues.speaker: HISTORIAN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Exactly as it was told.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A young boy’s avatar -- ERNIE, age ten -- follows the Historian as he ambles down a long hallway, closing all t doors they've opened. The narration of the movie has inde been Wade telling his own story, just as Halliday told hi

dialogues.speaker: ERNIE
dialogues.text: But what happened with the first five? Did Wade share the Oasis with them?

dialogues.speaker: HISTORIAN
dialogues.text: Of course. Well, until the great schism. But that’s next door, in volume three.

dialogues.speaker: ERNIE
dialogues.text: The what?

dialogues.speaker: HISTORIAN
dialogues.text: After the War of the Oasis, in volume two, there was the Great Schism. When Shoto raised an army of... (catching himself) I don’t want to spoil it. Off you go now, your class is leaving.  121.

dialogues.speaker: ERNIE
dialogues.text: Do you know any cheats for Aech’s scavenger hunt?

dialogues.speaker: HISTORIAN
dialogues.text: No, and if I did I wouldn’t tell you. Off we go.

dialogues.speaker: ERNIE
dialogues.text: I’1l come back tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: HISTORIAN
dialogues.text: No need. Try another book. Or maybe video games?

dialogues.speaker: ERNIE
dialogues.text: I love Parzival and I’m coming back every single day! And I’m gonna write my own memoir! The Historian looks less than thrilled as Ernie races off catch up with his class as they exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long line of people snake down the street, all waiting enter the most popular biography on Memoiropolis:

dialogues.speaker: READY PLAYER ONE
dialogues.text: Wade’s story is divided into three separate buildings, on for each volume. As we pan past the line, we reveal other memoirs, some mo crowded than others: COOKING WITH SWORDS -- Shoto and Daito’s poorly reviewed cookbook. THE HUNT FOR JRC -- A badass account of how Artemis hunte down a rogue JaRichard Cheney in the Oasis Wars. And finally... OASIS 2.0, Aech’s account of how she built the mysterious frightening Second Oasis, that some claim exists INSIDE t first Oasis. Ernie walks past them all, a smile on his face, a sparkle his eye. Inspired, as we all are, by a great story... no matter what form it might take. GAME OVER.
